about_the_game:
This is a network battle game, there is a mobile planet in the endless universe, the ruler of this planet warlike, leading their own troops to invade every planet with life, detected a group of radio waves after the discovery of the earth!Scientists found the planet is close to the earth and sent out a warning to the world, a panic in the world, but there is no collision with earth, planet and killing alien spacecraft descended to earth and driving, more on earth, in order to resist the alien forces, the world of martial arts and soldiers have to stand up against, started a war!Hard work pays off, finally two forces reached a balance, the extraterrestrial below the situation of stalemate and the earth reached an agreement to stop goods, but the war did not stop, aggressive planet issued a challenge to the earth, to carry out martial arts competition, each lost party will cede a piece of land to the planet to the other side as a colony.Each side of the competition sent a relative number of soldiers as a team to the designated field (aggressive planet or earth), the start of the competition to fight, destroy all the team members of the other side is considered to win!
  • You will control a 3D character, walk, jump, fly, attack, kill skills, etc.
  • You'll find resources in the tournament arena to boost your stamina and find treasures to boost your abilities.
  • Game time is limited, in a limited time without defeating all the opponent's players in the case of multiple players win.

content_descriptors.notes: WARNING: This game contains strong language and extreme violence.

detailed_description:

  • You will control a 3D character, walk, jump, fly, attack, kill skills, etc.
  • You'll find resources in the tournament arena to boost your stamina and find treasures to boost your abilities.
  • Game time is limited, in a limited time without defeating all the opponent's players in the case of multiple players win.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: WINDOWS® 7, 8.1, 10 (64-BIT Required)
  • Processor: Intel Celeron G1820 / AMD Athlon II X3 455
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 760 or AMD Radeon™ R7 260x with 2GB Video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: WINDOWS® 7, 8.1, 10 (64-BIT Required)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-3770 or AMD FX™-9590 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon™ RX 480 with 3GB VRAM

  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: The aggressive planets challenged the Earth to a martial arts contest, and each loser would give up a piece of land to the planet for a colony on the other side.Start the game fighting and wipe out all the team members of the other side to be considered the winner!
